RecipeDef.label: Make medicine
RecipeDef.description: A kit of industrial-era medical equipment. It contains basic drugs, tools for suturing and bone setting, diagnostic devices, and various pads and fluids.

RecipeDef.label: advanced herbal medicine х25
RecipeDef.description: A pack of herbal concoctions extracted from various medical plants. It is less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals, but much better than healroots.\nThis medicine is valued by tribespeople, as there is known that in hands of a good shaman, it can save the life of people.
